bug.author: rasbt
bug.summary: [JOSS] LICENSE.txt and COPYRIGHT.txt slightly out of sync
bug.description:
Hi, there, going through the JOSS checklist for the software review, I saw that the LICENSE.txt and COPYRIGHT.txt are slightly out of sync: LICENSE.txt:
Copyright (c) 2007-2016, mlpack contributors (see COPYRIGHT.txt)
COPYRIGHT.txt:
Copyright 2008-2018, Ryan Curtin ryan@ratml.org ...
For the version that will get archived with the JOSS paper, it's maybe best to update the License file with the most up to date copyright info

comments.comment: Fixed in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/pull/1408>#1408</denchmark-link> ---thanks for pointing it out. Just a minor oversight.
